## dataServerResultFilter() function

Data server result filter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function dataServerResultFilter(result: RawDataServerResult, rowId?: string): FilteredDataServerResult;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  result | [RawDataServerResult](./foundation-comms.rawdataserverresult.md) | The raw data server result. |
|  rowId | string | _(Optional)_ Row id. Defaults to ROW\_REF. |

**Returns:**

[FilteredDataServerResult](./foundation-comms.filtereddataserverresult.md)

## Remarks

Centralised filter logic for row operations.
